{{Infobox football biography |name = Ciaron Brown |image = |image_size = |caption = |fullname = Ciaron Maurice Brown{{cite web |url=https://www.premierleague.com/news/1034294 |title=Updated squad lists for 2018/19 Premier League |publisher=Premier League |date=1 February 2019 |accessdate=23 February 2019 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20190202022833/https://www.premierleague.com/news/1034294 |archive-date=2 February 2019 |dead-url=no |df=dmy-all }} |birth_date = {{birth date and age|1998|01|14|df=y}}{{cite web |url=https://www.cardiffcityfc.co.uk/teams/first-team/defender/ciaron-brown/ |title= Ciaron Brown|publisher= Cardiff City Football Club |accessdate=30 August 2018}} |birth_place = England |height = |position = [[Defender (association football)|Defender]] |currentclub = [[Livingston F.C.|Livingston]]
(on loan from [[Cardiff City F.C.|Cardiff City]]) |clubnumber = 5 |years1 = {{0}}{{0}}{{0}}{{0}}–2016 |clubs1 = [[Bedfont Sports F.C.|Bedfont Sports]] |caps1 = |goals1 = |years2 = 2016–2018 |clubs2 = [[Wealdstone F.C.|Wealdstone]] |caps2 = 46 |goals2 = 2 |years3 = 2018– |clubs3 = [[Cardiff City F.C.|Cardiff City]] |caps3 = 0 |goals3 = 0 |years4 = 2019– |clubs4 = → [[Livingston F.C.|Livingston]] (loan) |caps4 = 1 |goals4 = 0 |nationalyears1 = |nationalteam1 = |nationalcaps1 = |nationalgoals1 = |club-update = 23 February 2019 |nationalteam-update = }} '''Ciaron Maurice Brown''' (born 14 January 1998) is an English professional [[association football|footballer]] who plays as a [[Defender (association football)|defender]] for [[Scottish Premiership]] club [[Livingston F.C.|Livingston]], on loan from [[Cardiff City F.C.|Cardiff City]]. ==Club career== === Early career === Brown enjoyed a stint at amateur side [[Bedfont Sports F.C.|Bedfont Sports]] before moving to [[National League South]] club [[Wealdstone F.C.|Wealdstone]].{{cite web |url=https://www.walesonline.co.uk/sport/football/football-news/ciaron-brown-ogo-obi-who-14130459 |title= Ciaron Brown and Ogo Obi: Who are the two Under-23 players Cardiff City have signed? |publisher= WalesOnline |accessdate=30 August 2018}} He made over 50 appearances for the [[Ruislip]]-based club, scoring twice.{{cite web |url=https://us.soccerway.com/players/ciaron-brown/452582/ |title= C.Brown|publisher= Soccerway |accessdate=30 August 2018}} === Cardiff City === After a successful trial period, Brown was signed by [[Cardiff City F.C.|Cardiff City]] on 9 January 2018.{{cite web |url=https://www.11v11.com/players/ciaron-brown-257018/|title= Ciaron Brown - Football Player Statistics|publisher= 11v11.com |accessdate=30 August 2018}} He was an unused substitute in Cardiff's 3–1 defeat to [[Norwich City F.C.|Norwich City]] in the [[EFL Cup]].{{cite web |url=https://www.bbc.co.uk/sport/football/45254466 |title= Cardiff 1-3 Norwich |publisher= BBC Wales Sport |accessdate=30 August 2018}} === Loan to Livingston === On 24 January 2019, [[Livingston F.C.|Livingston]] confirmed the signing of Brown on loan from Cardiff.{{Cite news|url=https://www.bbc.com/sport/football/46993314|title=Livingston: Cardiff City's Ciaron Brown signs on loan|date=24 January 2019|access-date=23 February 2019|language=en-GB}} He played his first league game on 23 February 2019, playing 63 minutes against [[Kilmarnock F.C.|Kilmarnock]].{{Cite web|url=https://int.soccerway.com/matches/2019/02/23/scotland/premier-league/livingston-fc/kilmarnock-fc/2796434/|title=Livingston vs. Kilmarnock - 23 February 2019 - Soccerway|website=int.soccerway.com|access-date=23 February 2019}} ==References== {{reflist}} == External links == {{Soccerway|id=ciaron-brown/452582}} {{Livingston F.C. squad}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Brown, Ciaron}} [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:1998 births]] [[Category:English footballers]] [[Category:Association football defenders]] [[Category:Wealdstone F.C. players]] [[Category:Cardiff City F.C. players]] [[Category:Livingston F.C. players]] [[Category:Scottish Professional Football League players]] {{England-footy-defender-1990s-stub}}
